manifest_description.message: Site specific settings on your sidebar.

notification_install_title.message: Site Setting Sidebar has been installed

notification_install_body.message: Please, take a look at the Settings!

notification_update_title.message: Site Setting Sidebar has been updated

notification_update_body.message: Please, take a look at the Settings to find out what's new!

sidebar_zoom_value.message: Value|Valid values are between 20% and 500%.|Reset sets zoom level to the default value given in the Settings.

sidebar_content_cookies.message: Cookies|Control how local data can be stored on your machine.

sidebar_content_images.message: Images|Allow or block images on the website.

sidebar_content_javascript.message: JavaScript|Allow or block JavaScript on the website.|Most sites will be broken if you block JavaScript.

sidebar_content_plugins.message: Plugins|Allow or block plugins on the website.

sidebar_content_unsandboxedPlugins.message: Unsandboxed plugins|Allow or block plugins to reach out of the safety environment of the browser.|Use "Allow" with extreme caution! Unsandboxed plugins can install other stuff on your machine.

sidebar_permissions_automaticDownloads.message: Automatic downloads|Permission to the website to download multiple files at once.|Use "Allow" with extreme caution! The website will be able to send files to your machine without your interaction.

sidebar_permissions_camera.message: Camera|Permission to the website to access your webcamera.|Currently disabled because of a Chromium issue.

sidebar_permissions_fullscreen.message: Fullscreen|Permission to the website to switch the browser to fullscreen mode automatically.|You can leave fullscreen mode any time by pressing Esc or F11.

sidebar_permissions_location.message: Location|Permission to the website to track your geographic location.

sidebar_permissions_popups.message: Popups|Permission to the website to use popup windows.

sidebar_permissions_microphone.message: Microphone|Permission to the website to access your microphone.|Currently disabled because of a Chromium issue.

sidebar_permissions_mouselock.message: Mouselock|Permission to the website to disable your mouse cursor.|You can get back your cursor any time by pressing Esc.

sidebar_permissions_notifications.message: Notifications|Permission to the website to show you notifications.

settings_content_page_autoRefresh.message: Refresh the page automatically after content settings change

settings_content_button_zoomOnBadge.message: Show zoom level on the button

settings_content_incognito_info.message: If you want to use this extension in private mode, you have to activate in manualy in the Extension manager.

settings_content_shortcut_info.message: Alt+Shift+S is the default shortcut to open/close the panel. You can change it in the Keyboard shortcuts dialog.

settings_content_howToUse_tooltip.message: For help and additional information, hover over the icons on the panel.

settings_content_howToUse_colorCode.message: Color codes are indicating security issues. Green: default, safe. Yellow: changed, but safe. Red: potentially dangerous.

settings_content_notes_doesNotWork.message: This extension can not change content settings on the internal browser pages and the Opera addon catalog. This is an Opera policy.

settings_content_notes_remove.message: If you remove this extension, all the changes made by this extension will be lost.

settings_content_credits_createdBy.message: Site Settings Sidebar is created by Robert Toth.

settings_content_credits_copyCode.message: Besides my own coding I use some layout and style from the internal pages made by Opera Software ASA.

settings_content_credits_thanks.message: Thanks for every contributor! (See the changelog for details!)

settings_content_warning_notResponsible.message: This extension was not made by Opera Software ASA. The company is not responsible for any of the errors.

settings_content_license_share.message: You can share this extension, but I ask you to link the download page instead of copying the NEX file.

settings_content_license_copy.message: You can copy and modify the code of this extension as long as it's free and you use the proper credits.

settings_content_permissions_contentSett.message: Site Settings Sidebar needs permission to access your content settings (images, location, camera, etc.) so you can control them.

settings_content_permissions_notificatio.message: Site Settings Sidebar needs permission to use notifications to inform you about updates.

settings_content_permissions_tabs.message: Site Settings Sidebar needs permission to access your tabs so you can control the zoom settings with it.

settings_content_permissions_storage.message: Site Settings Sidebar needs permission to access to storage to save your preferences.
